input.sentences: our house is the larger brick house | next to the white house .
the area where we live is near a lake .
this is the fence that acts as a guardrail | near our house .
the shallow mountains are located to the other side of the lake .
this is picture of my car | parked near our house | overlooking the lake .
output.sentences: When we pulled to our accomodations for our weekend getaway we finally found the white guest house in which we'd stay, meager accomodations compared to the very very large house next door.
But later we began to appreciate the view of the lake and the nearby village.
The terrain was terraced with ours even having a guard rail/fence to keep up from stumbling off the edge..
On the other side of the shallow lake were mountains, first small ones, the larger ones off in the distance.
And we got to drive around and see the lake from different angles.
